title: Creamy Beef Tips with Egg Noodles

Ingredients.3: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.6: 1 (1.25 ounce) package beef with onion soup mix

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute beef sirloin tips with onion in the hot skillet until beef is browned, about 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Stir cream of mushroom soup, milk, red wine, and beef with onion soup mix together in a bowl, pour into the skillet, and stir to coat beef in the soup mixture; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, place a cover on the skillet, and cook until the beef tips are tender, about 2 hours.

Directions.3: Reduce heat to lowest setting and continue cooking until the beef pulls apart easily with a fork, at least 4 hours more.

Directions.4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes. Drain.

Directions.5: Ladle beef tips mixture over egg noodles.
